channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 04:32 Drive alarm to the Rivne region.Creck on further messages.
item.description: 游릭 04:32 Drive alarm to the Rivne region.Creck on further messages.#Rivne_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
